pages.text: qasam hai fajr ki
aur das raatho ki
aur jufth1 aur taaq2 ki
aur raath ki jab wo chalne lage
kya in mein aqal mandh ke waaste kaafi qasam hai
kya aap ne nahi dekha ke aap ke rab ne aadiyo ke saath kya kiya
sutuno waale iram ke saath
jis ki maanindh (koyi khaum) mulko mein paida nahi ki gayi
aur samodiyo ke saath, jinhone waadi mein bade bade patthar taraashe thein
aur feraun ke saath jo meqo waala tha
in sabo ne shahro mein sar utha rakha tha
aur bahuth fasaad macha rakha tha
aaqir tere rab ne in sab par azaab ka koda barsaaya
yaqinan tera rab ghaath mein hai
insaan (ka ye haal hai ke) jab ose us ka rab azmaata hai, aur izzath wa nemath deta hai, to wo kehne lagta hai ke mere rab ne mujhe izzath daar banaaya
aur jab wo us ko azmaata hai, us ki rozi tang kar deta hai, to kehne lagta hai ke mere rab ne meri ihaanath ki (aur zaleel kiya)
aisa hargiz nahi, balke (baath ye hai) ke tum (hee) log yatimo ki izzath nahi karte
aur miskino ke khilaane ki ek dosre ko targheeb nahi dete
aur (murdo ki) miraas samet samet kar khaate ho
aur maal ko ji bhar kar azeez rakhte ho
yaqinan jis waqt zameen koot koot kar baraabar kardi jayegi
aur tera rab (khud) aa jayega aur farishte sa-fe baandh kar (aa jayenge)
aur jis din jahannam bhi laayi jayegi, us din insaan ko samajh ayegi, magar aaj us ke samjahne ka fayda kahaa
